Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: As for weaknesses, that's a great question. I'd say our biggest weakness is extreme decentralization! Which might sound crazy. But we have a globally distributed team, with people on 4 different continents, so it's tough to coordinate meeting times and stay in step with each other

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: We end up communicating through chat most of the time

Author: TS#7923

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
Roadmap:  yes there are details to be revealed at & after rebrand.
Past roadmaps: Komodo did not exist during NXT, sure a lot of the technology was planned in those days, which culminated in komodo platform v1.   Basilik mode is a tech question to ask in a dev channel.  I'm not familiar with it.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
our technology offerings are very wide and that creates few challagnes for us, 1) our tech is little harder to understand, 2) we will have to rely on partners to build industry specific solutions (thus the partner network).

I think of it like this: Komodo is building a 'horizontal' platform and others have to come and build 'vertical' platforms that reach the end customers/use cases.

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content:
A few other reasons to hold KMD:

-- you get to participate in the annual Notary Node election, which allows KMD holders to vote for and choose 32 new operators

-- KMD is the primary trading pair for every other listed asset on the upcoming DEX

Author: susmech#0540
Content: How would Komodo describe current state of blockchain

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
KMD has always been a currency within the ecosystem, for ecosystem services.   These services have and are being built out continually.  Currently dPoW, liquidity between assets in the dexfee market.   In the future, the antara modules will be able to utilize kmd for the sidechains that will be created for some features.   At the moment half a dozen building block modules have been built. 
With the ability to add sidechains with purpose built functionality on top of these building blocks (like a token system, gateways to 3rd party chains so they can get tech upgrades by tokenizing onto a kmd sidechain....& any future building blocks). 
There are currently 255 slots for building blocks.   When we need more building blocks, we can add more slots when that time comes.
